abstract: In Japan, the dollar’s decline has ignited fears that too strong of a domestic currency could harm the country’s recovery, led by exporters like Toyota.
snippet: In Japan, the dollar’s decline has ignited fears that too strong of a domestic currency could harm the country’s recovery, led by exporters like Toyota.
lead_paragraph: TOKYO  The dollar sank to a 15-year low against the yen on Wednesday, as the Federal Reserve’s pessimistic view of the American economy prompted investors to sell the American currency for safer assets.

headline.main: Dollar Hits Low Against Yen, Dealing Blow to Japan’s Economy
headline.print_headline: Dollar Hits Low Against Yen, Dealing Blow to Japan’s Economy

abstract: Security experts are trying to raise awareness about the potential dangers of geotags, bits of GPS data that identify where a photo or video was taken.
snippet: Security experts are trying to raise awareness about the potential dangers of geotags, bits of GPS data that identify where a photo or video was taken.
lead_paragraph: When Adam Savage, host of the popular science program “MythBusters,” posted a picture on Twitter of his automobile parked in front of his house, he let his fans know much more than that he drove a Toyota Land Cruiser.

headline.main: Web Photos That Reveal Secrets, Like Where You Live
headline.print_headline: Web Photos That Reveal Secrets, Like Where You Live
